titleStmt.title: To the Kings most excellent Maiestie. The humble petition of two sisters the Church and Common-wealth: for the restoring of their ancient commons and liberties, which late inclosure with depopulation, vncharitably hath taken away: containing seuen reasons as euidences for the same.
titleStmt.author: Trigge, Francis, 1547?-1606.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The humble petition of two sisters.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
